a.title: Essex Schools Emergency Management Plan in Response to COVID-19

div.a: Essex Schools Emergency Management Plan in Response to COVID-19

div.div: Essex County Government announced that 2 people in Essex County have tested positive for coronavirus (COVID-19). This case marks the first 2 cases in Essex County. Both people are at home recovering. The strong probability of community spread is being investigated.
P.O. Box 756, 109 N. Cross St, Tappahannock, VA 22560
